email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight rate is in the low 50s ($50.50 per ton). Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Can you come down to $49.75 per ton? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I can offer $50.00 per ton, which is a fair rate given the current market. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $50.00 per ton is acceptable. Let’s proceed with the MV Ocean Star. Please confirm the laycan and send over the charter party agreement. Also, confirm the demurrage rate is $25,000 per day. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. The laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October, and the demurrage rate is $25,000 per day. I’ll send over the charter party agreement shortly. Thanks for your prompt response. Best, Sarah
